name: JSONDecoder.KeyDecodingStrategy
desc: The values that determine how to decode a type’s coding keys from JSON keys.

items.name: case convertFromSnakeCase
items.desc: A key decoding strategy that converts snake-case keys to camel-case keys.

items.name: case useDefaultKeys
items.desc: A key decoding strategy that doesn’t change key names during decoding.

items.name: case custom(([CodingKey]) -> CodingKey)
items.desc: A key decoding strategy defined by the closure you supply.
